Neck Stretch.Exercise_Content: 1.Stand straight with your feet hip-width apart and tilt your head toward the shoulder.</br>2. Place your hand on your head and gently pull until you feel the stretch in your neck.</br>3. Hold for 10 to 15 seconds and repeat on the other side.

Neck Extension.Exercise_Content: Without arching your back, slowly move your head backward so you are looking upward. Hold for five seconds. Return to starting position. This is a good exercise to do during work to prevent neck strain.
